0.text: Innate: Periodically, Rakan generates a 30 − 225 (based on level) (+ 85% AP)  shield that lasts until broken. After being out of combat for 5 seconds, any leftover shield will be restored to maximum value.
0.html: Innate: Periodically, Rakan generates a 30 − 225 (based on level) (+ 85% AP) shield that lasts until broken. After being out of combat for 5 seconds, any leftover shield will be restored to maximum value.

1.text: Rakan's basic attacks and ability hits  reduce Fey Feathers'  cooldown by 1 second for each enemy  champion hit.
1.html: Rakan's basic attacks and ability hits  reduce Fey Feathers' cooldown by 1 second for each enemy champion hit.

2.text: Innate - Lover's Leap: If either Rakan or  Xayah is channeling  Recall, the other may move nearby and channel their own to join alongside them. Both reach base at the time of which the initiator's  Recall completes.
2.html: Innate - Lover's Leap: If either Rakan or Xayah is channeling Recall, the other may move nearby and channel their own to join alongside them. Both reach base at the time of which the initiator's Recall completes.

0.text: Active: Rakan slings an enchanted feather in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit.
0.html: Active: Rakan slings an enchanted feather in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit.

1.text: If the target was an enemy  champion or epic  monster, a radius is marked around Rakan. After 3 seconds or if an allied champion enters the radius, Rakan  heals himself and nearby allied champions for 30 − 115 (based on level) (+ 55% AP).
1.html: If the target was an enemy champion or epic monster, a radius is marked around Rakan. After 3 seconds or if an allied champion enters the radius, Rakan heals himself and nearby allied champions for 30 − 115 (based on level) (+ 55% AP).

0.text: Active: Rakan  dashes to the target location.
0.html: Active: Rakan dashes to the target location.

1.text: After a 0.35-second delay upon arrival, he deals magic damage to nearby enemies and  knocks them up for 1 second.
1.html: After a 0.35-second delay upon arrival, he deals magic damage to nearby enemies and knocks them up for 1 second.

2.text: Rakan will be  knocked down by any  immobilizing or  polymorphing crowd control, excluding  sleep(bug), during Grand Entrance.
2.html: Rakan will be knocked down by any immobilizing or polymorphing crowd control, excluding sleep(bug), during Grand Entrance.

3.text: Grand Entrance will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
3.html: Grand Entrance will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Rakan  shields the target allied champion for 3 seconds and then  dashes to and around them. Battle Dance can be recast within 5 seconds at no additional cost.
0.html: Active: Rakan shields the target allied champion for 3 seconds and then dashes to and around them. Battle Dance can be recast within 5 seconds at no additional cost.

1.text: Recast: Rakan mimics the first cast's effects.

2.text: Rakan will be  knocked down by any  immobilizing or  polymorphing crowd control, excluding  sleep(bug), during Battle Dance.
2.html: Rakan will be knocked down by any immobilizing or polymorphing crowd control, excluding sleep(bug), during Battle Dance.

3.text: If  Xayah is the target, Battle Dance can be cast from an increased  range.
3.html: If Xayah is the target, Battle Dance can be cast from an increased  range.

0.text: Active: Rakan breaks into a captivating sprint for 4 seconds, gaining  75% bonus movement speed and becoming  ghosted for the duration. During this time, Rakan deals magic damage to enemies he collides with and  charms and  slows them by 75% for a duration. This cannot affect the same enemy more than once.
0.html: Active: Rakan breaks into a captivating sprint for 4 seconds, gaining  75% bonus movement speed and becoming ghosted for the duration. During this time, Rakan deals magic damage to enemies he collides with and charms and slows them by 75% for a duration. This cannot affect the same enemy more than once.

1.text: Colliding with an enemy  champion extends The Quickness' duration by 0.25 seconds, which can occur once per champion. When Rakan collides with his first enemy  champion, he gains an additional  75% bonus movement speed that decays after 0.5 seconds by 20% every 0.5 seconds, then by 15% after decaying by 60% over 1.5 seconds.
1.html: Colliding with an enemy champion extends The Quickness' duration by 0.25 seconds, which can occur once per champion. When Rakan collides with his first enemy champion, he gains an additional  75% bonus movement speed that decays after 0.5 seconds by 20% every 0.5 seconds, then by 15% after decaying by 60% over 1.5 seconds.

2.text: During The Quickness, Rakan cannot basic attack enemy champions he did not collide with, unless the attack command was inputted before the ability was activated.
2.html: During The Quickness, Rakan cannot basic attack enemy champions he did not collide with, unless the attack command was inputted before the ability was activated.

abilities.concerningText: Active: Rakan slings an enchanted feather in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit.
After a 0.35-second delay upon arrival, he deals magic damage to nearby enemies and  knocks them up for 1 second.
Active: Rakan  shields the target allied champion for 3 seconds and then  dashes to and around them. Battle Dance can be recast within 5 seconds at no additional cost.

Active: Rakan breaks into a captivating sprint for 4 seconds, gaining  75% bonus movement speed and becoming  ghosted for the duration. During this time, Rakan deals magic damage to enemies he collides with and  charms and  slows them by 75% for a duration. This cannot affect the same enemy more than once.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+5 ability power
+30 health
+25% base health regeneration
+ 2 per 10 seconds

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Spoils of War: Grants a charge every 35 seconds, up to 3 charges. Basic attacks can consume a charge to execute minions. Basic attacks execute minions below ( 50% / 30%) of their maximum health. Killing a minion by any means with a charge grants you and the nearest allied champion kill gold. These effects require an allied champion to be nearby. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
Unique – Quest: Earn 500 using this item to upgrade to Targon's Buckler, gaining the Warding active with 3 wards in stock.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SPOILS OF WAR: Grants a charge every 35 seconds, up to 3 charges. Basic attacks can consume a charge to execute minions. Basic attacks  execute minions below ( 50% /  30%) of their maximum health. Killing a minion by any means with a charge grants you and the nearest allied champion kill  gold. These effects require an allied champion to be nearby. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Inspire: Grants you and all allies within 1000 units of you 30% bonus movement speed for 4 seconds (75 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – INSPIRE: Grants you and all allies within 1000 units of you 30% bonus movement speed for 4 seconds (75 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Motivate: Healing, shielding, or buffing allied champions (excluding yourself) grants you and them 25% bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds (4 (per champion) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 ability haste.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – MOTIVATE:  Healing,  shielding, or buffing allied champions (excluding yourself) grants you and them 25% bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds (4 (per champion) second cooldown).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+60 ability power
+20 ability haste
+100% base mana regeneration

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Puffcap Toxin: Dealing magic damage to enemy champions inflicts them with 25% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds. Healing or shielding allied champions (excluding yourself) empowers your and their next instance of damage against enemy champions within 5 seconds to apply 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – PUFFCAP TOXIN: Dealing magic damage to enemy champions inflicts them with 25%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.  Healing or  shielding allied champions (excluding yourself) empowers your and their next instance of damage against enemy champions within 5 seconds to apply 40%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.

Stats

+250 mana
+35 armor

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Conduit: Designate an allied champion as the Accomplice, forming a tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as the Accomplice by one Zeke's Convergence at a time (60 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – CONDUIT: Designate an allied champion as the Accomplice, forming a  tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as the Accomplice by one Zeke's Convergence at a time (60 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Convergence: Immobilizing enemy champions marks them for 8 seconds. Your Accomplice's basic attacks on-hit and ability hits against marked enemies fire a missile at them that deals them 30 − 70 (based on level) (+ 7.5% AP) (+ 1.5% maximum health) bonus magic damage upon arrival.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – CONVERGENCE:  Immobilizing enemy champions marks them for 8 seconds. Your Accomplice's basic attacks on-hit and ability hits against marked enemies fire a missile at them that deals them 30 − 70 (based on level) (+ 7.5% AP) (+ 1.5% maximum health) bonus magic damage upon arrival.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Intervention: Call upon a beam of light to strike upon the target location after 2.5 seconds, granting sight of the area for the duration. Allies within the area are healed for 180 − 340 (based on target's level), while enemy champions within take 10% of target's maximum health as true damage. Can be used while dead. (90 second cooldown; 5500 range).
active.originText: UNIQUE – INTERVENTION: Call upon a beam of light to strike upon the target location after 2.5 seconds, granting  sight of the area for the duration. Allies within the area are  healed for 180 − 340 (based on target's level), while enemy  champions within take 10% of target's maximum health as true damage. Can be used while dead. (90 second cooldown; 5500 range).

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Pledge: Designate an allied champion as Worthy, forming a tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as Worthy by one Knight's Vow at a time (60 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – PLEDGE: Designate an allied champion as Worthy, forming a  tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as Worthy by one Knight's Vow at a time (60 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Sacrifice: While your Worthy ally is nearby and you are above 30% of your maximum health, redirect 10% of the post-mitigation physical and magic damage they take to you as true damage and heal for 7% of the damage dealt by your Worthy ally to champions. If they are below 30% maximum health, the damage redirection is increased to 20%.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SACRIFICE: While your Worthy ally is nearby and you are above 30% of your maximum health, redirect 10% of the post-mitigation physical and magic damage they take to you as true damage and  heal for 7% of the damage dealt by your Worthy ally to champions. If they are below 30% maximum health, the damage redirection is increased to 20%.

st_flatStats0.concerningText: Active: Rakan  shields the target allied champion for 3 seconds and then  dashes to and around them. Battle Dance can be recast within 5 seconds at no additional cost.
Active: Rakan  shields the target allied champion for 3 seconds and then  dashes to and around them. Battle Dance can be recast within 5 seconds at no additional cost.
